name: OPERATION COBRA - WASTELANDS
description:
Operation Cobra - Wastelands is currently in development.

(We are working on a much larger version as well with more challenging fights set in a new open environment.)

1) Download and extract the zip file to a new folder

2) Run the Operation Cobra - Wastelands Application (executable)

Instructions on how to play will be shown in-game.

NOTE: You must play on a Windows PC with at least 4GB Ram
